Name: Windows Service - Stop
Description: Stops a Windows Service if it is running.
Author: nblumhardt

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody: $serviceName = $OctopusParameters['ServiceName']Write-Output "Stopping $serviceName..."$serviceInstance = Get-Service $serviceName -ErrorAction SilentlyContinueif ($serviceInstance -ne $null) {    Stop-Service $serviceName -Force    $serviceInstance.WaitForStatus('Stopped', '00:01:00')    Write-Output "Service $serviceName stopped."} else {    Write-Output "The $serviceName service could not be located."}

Parameters.Name: ServiceName
Parameters.Label: Service Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the Windows Service (this is not always the display name).
